TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {135940=28 July 2015, 137158=JSWSteel Jul Fut, 136451=UnitedBrewerie Jul Fut, 215407=Astec LifeSciences Recommended on Mar 31st 2015, 216716=Bombay Burmah is in the Plantations - Tea & Coffee sector. The current market capitalisation stands at Rs 3,677.33 crore. The company management includes Nusli N Wadia - Chairman, A K Hirjee - Vice Chairman, A Panjwani - Managing Director, Ness Wadia - Managing Director, M L Apte - Director, D E Udwadia - Director, Jeh Wadia - Director, Sheela Bhide - Independent Director. It is listed on the BSE with a BSE Code of 501425 and the NSE with an NSE Code of BBTC. Its Registered office is at 9, Wallace Street, Fort, Mumbai,Maharashtra - 400001. Their Registrars are Sharepro Services (India) Pvt.Ltd.}
